page.title: 20Tourism,Wick
page.content:
Five years ago the Caravan Club opened a site at Wick Riverside.By advertising,this has attracted tourists from all over Europe.This site,with a picturesque view of Wick River,covers an area of 6 acres and can accommodate 90 caravans and tents. The nightly charge for a caravan is Â£4.40 for members and Â£4.90 for non-members.Facilities include showers and a laundry.
Visitors may enjoy a walk along the river to watch keen fishermen or make use of the Rifle Range facilities. Sports enthusiasts may exercise on the newly laid trim track.
